name: JewelBeat
overview:
JewelBeat provides music for use in commercial and non-commercial projects.

Music downloads are 99Â¢ per download. Music in also available on USB drives and hard disks. There are currently over 500 albums with over 35,000 tracks in the library.

The license with the 99Â¢ download allows users to use the music track in broadcast advertising, photo slideshows, video editing, online videos (e.g. YouTube), video games, mobile apps, and more.

JewelBeat primarily serves photographers and videographers.
